Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP25
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP25.Model.GodPowers

Class GodPower

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP25.Model.GodPowers.GodPower
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hera, Hypnus, Limus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus, Zeus 
public class GodPower
extends java.lang.Object
God Power class. This class represents the "Strategy" class in a Strategy Pattern in which specific Gods (Athena, Apollo, Artemis etc) are the Concrete Strategies and Player is the Context. Workers can move, build, check the victory by using methods in GodPower (or Overridden methods in the extensions of God Power)

      Returns:
      List of possible Spaces where the Worker passed as argument can move to

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove​(Worker worker, Space space)
      canMove is overridden in subclasses of GodPower to specify god effects that are active during opponents' turns
      Parameters:
      worker - the opponent's Worker that we want to know if he can move to 'space'
      space - Space where we want to know if the 'worker' can move
      Returns:
      true if the movement is valid according to the GodPower's effect

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • verifyLoseByMovement

      protected boolean verifyLoseByMovement​(java.util.List<Space> spacesW1, java.util.List<Space> spacesW2)
      Returns true if the Player cannot move any of his workers
      Parameters:
      spacesW1 - List of possible Spaces where Worker 1 can move
      spacesW2 - List of possible Spaces where Worker 2 can move
      Returns:
      true if both Worker 1 and Worker 2 can't move and the Player who controls the two Workers has lost

    • verifyLoseByBuilding

      protected boolean verifyLoseByBuilding​(java.util.List<Space> buildingSpaces)
      Returns true if the Player cannot build with his selected Worker
      Parameters:
      buildingSpaces - list of possible Spaces where the moved Worker can build
      Returns:
      true if the Worker can't build and the Player who controls him has lost

    • turnSequence

      public TurnResult turnSequence​(Player player, ActiveEffects activeEffects) throws DisconnectionException
      turnSequence manages the sequence of actions in a turn. The Player is asked to 1) Choose a worker 2) Move the worker in a valid space 3) Build a block in a valid space turnSequence also verify if a player has won/has lost specific godPower overrides this method to change the sequence of actions in a turn (for example, in order to move twice or build twice, to build before the first move etc.)
      Parameters:
      player - playing the round
      activeEffects - array containing opponents god power effects that may influence this turn
      Returns:
      TurnResult.LOSE if the player has lost during this turn TurnResult.WIN if the player has won during this turn TurnResult.CONTINUE if the player hasn't lost or won during this turn
      Throws:
      DisconnectionException - exception thrown in case of disconnection of a client or disconnection of the server

    • askToMoveWorker

      protected boolean askToMoveWorker​(Player player, java.util.List<Space> validMovementSpacesW1, java.util.List<Space> validMovementSpacesW2) throws DisconnectionException
      The Player is asked to select a Worker and to move the selected Worker in a valid movement Space.
      Parameters:
      player - who is playing the turn
      validMovementSpacesW1 - List of valid Spaces where Worker 1 can move
      validMovementSpacesW2 - List of valid Spaces where Worker 2 can move
      Returns:
      true if the Player has won the game
      Throws:
      DisconnectionException - exception thrown in case of disconnection of a client or disconnection of the server

    • askToBuild

      protected Space askToBuild​(Player player, java.util.List<Space> validBuildingSpaces) throws DisconnectionException
      The Player is asked to chose the Space where the selected Worker has to build
      Parameters:
      player - who is playing the turn
      validBuildingSpaces - List of valid Spaces where the selected Worker can build
      Returns:
      the Spaces selected for the building action
      Throws:
      DisconnectionException - exception thrown in case of disconnection of a client or disconnection of the server

    • addActiveEffects

      protected void addActiveEffects​(ActiveEffects activeEffects, Worker worker1, Worker worker2, Worker selectedWorker)
      Add the god power effect of the current player to the list of god power effects that can influence opponents actions during their turn. If the god power effect of the current player does not influence opponents turn, a not relevant GodPower object is added to the list.
      Parameters:
      activeEffects - array containing opponents god power effects that may influence this turn
      worker1 - worker 1 controlled by the current player
      worker2 - worker 2 controlled by the current player
      selectedWorker - the worker selected for the movement and the building action during this turn

    • initializeWorkers

      public void initializeWorkers​(Player player, Space spaceW1, Space spaceW2)
      First positioning of workers in the board
      Parameters:
      player - who controls is playing the turn
      spaceW1 - Space where the Player wants to position his first Worker
      spaceW2 - Space where the Player wants to position his second Worker

      Overrides:
